<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Ghouls are ravenous undead who haunt graveyards and eat corpses.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ghoul_Ghoul.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Ghoul](/Monsters.aspx?ID=218)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 169</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 20
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +9 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus ghoul fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 slashing plus paralysis

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 1d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 15; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a ghoul the next midnight.

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul’s attack must succeed at a DC 15 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn’t trigger reactions.

</column>
